/32/01/2024 31 , 2024 Ref: IRDAI/HLT/CIR/PRO/32/01/2024 31st January,2024 / To, All General, Health Insurance Companies (Except ECGC & AIC) and Third Party Administrators Sub: Modification in Product for Persons with Disabilities(PWD), Persons afflicted with HIV/AIDS, and those suffering from Mental Illness. 1. / 58/02/2023 , 2023 Reference is invited to IRDAI Circular no: IRDAI/HLT/CIR/MISC/58/02/2023 dated 27th February, 2023 on the captioned subject. 2. In order to provide the health insurance policyholders with an equal choice of choosing either Allopathic Treatment or AYUSH Treatment, the following minor modifications are made in the model product enclosed to the above circular. 3. Clause 4.2. on AYUSH Treatment and AYUSH referred at clause 11 in Table of Benefits as well as Product Construct have been modified and shall be read as under: Expenses incurred for inpatient care treatment under Ayurveda, Yoga and Naturopathy, Unani, Siddha and Homeopathy systems of medicines is covered up to 100% of Sum Insured, during each policy year as specified in the policy schedule. 4. There is no change in other norms specified therein. 5. This Circular will come into force w.e.f 01.04.2024. . 115/1, - 500032 Survey No. 115/1, Financial District, Nanakramguda, Hyderabad 500 032 Phone: 040-20204000; www.irdai.gov.in
